forTenants.needGoodTenantsSubText: Decide by seeing what previous owners are saying about them!
forTenants.wreckHome: Worried that your tenants might wreck your home?
forTenants.wreckHomeAnswer: See your home photos along with rent every month.
forTenants.homeClean: Have old tenants who kept your home clean?
forTenants.homeCleanAnswer: Help them find great houses by rating them good :)
forTenants.homeDamaged: Have old tenants who damaged your home?
forTenants.homeDamagedAnswer: Rate them poorly so that other owners will know.

forOwners.goodTenantAnswer: Build a good rentscore & get great houses by asking your previous owners to rate you.
forOwners.doubtfulAboutOwnerAnswer: See what their past tenants are saying about them!
